00020 #include "binarywriter.h"   
00021 #include "packets.h"
00022 #include "constants.h"
00023     
00024 namespace RDK2 { namespace Serialization { namespace Binary {
00025     
00026     BinaryWriter::~BinaryWriter(){};
00027     
00028     Buffer BinaryWriter::createNamePacket(cstr name, Buffer payload) {
00029         if(!writeNames || (name=="")) return payload;
00030         Buffer packet;
00031         packet.push_back(PACKET_HEADER_NAME);
00032             Buffer namePacket = packet_string(name);
00033             packet.append(nbo_i32(payload.length()+namePacket.length()));
00034             packet.append(namePacket);
00035             packet.append(payload);
00036         return packet;
00037     }
00038     
00039     void BinaryWriter::write_u8(uint8_t v, cstr name) throw(WritingException) {
00040         appendBuffer( createNamePacket( name, packet_u8(v) ) );
00041     }
00042     void BinaryWriter::write_i8(int8_t v, cstr name) throw(WritingException) {
00043         appendBuffer( createNamePacket( name, packet_i8(v) ) );
00044     }
00045     void BinaryWriter::write_i16(int16_t v,cstr name) throw(WritingException) {
00046         appendBuffer( createNamePacket( name, packet_i16(v) ) );
00047     }
00048     void BinaryWriter::write_i32(int32_t v, cstr name) throw(WritingException) {
00049         appendBuffer( createNamePacket( name, packet_i32(v) ) );
00050     }
00051     void BinaryWriter::write_f32(float32_t v, cstr name)throw(WritingException) {
00052         appendBuffer( createNamePacket( name, packet_f32(v) ) );
00053     }
00054     void BinaryWriter::write_f64(float64_t v, cstr name)throw(WritingException) {
00055         appendBuffer( createNamePacket( name, packet_f64(v) ) );
00056     }
00057     
00058     void BinaryWriter::writeBytes(const void*v, size_t n, cstr name="") throw(WritingException){
00059         appendBuffer( createNamePacket(name, packet_bytes(v,n)));
00060     }
00061     void BinaryWriter::write_u8(const uint8_t*v, size_t n, cstr name="")throw(WritingException){
00062         writeBytes(v, n, name);
00063     }
00064     void BinaryWriter::write_i8(const int8_t*v, size_t n, cstr name="")throw(WritingException){
00065         writeBytes(v, n, name);
00066     }
00067     void BinaryWriter::write_i16(const int16_t*v, size_t n, cstr name="")throw(WritingException){
00068         appendBuffer( createNamePacket(name, packet_i16(v,n)));
00069     }
00070     void BinaryWriter::write_i32(const int32_t*v, size_t n, cstr name="")throw(WritingException){
00071         appendBuffer( createNamePacket(name, packet_i32(v,n)));
00072     }
00073     void BinaryWriter::write_f32(const float32_t*v, size_t n, cstr name="")throw(WritingException){
00074         appendBuffer( createNamePacket(name, packet_f32(v,n)));
00075     }
00076     void BinaryWriter::write_f64(const float64_t*v, size_t n, cstr name="") throw(WritingException){

00078     }   
00079     
00080     void BinaryWriter::writeString(cstr s, cstr name="") throw(WritingException) {
00081         appendBuffer( createNamePacket(name, packet_string(s)));
00082     }
